website_summaries.verdict: A tablet that may function best  for families and kids because of its quality as a content viewer, but isn’t robust enough for everyday multitasking.
pros: Very user friendly, with newer owners up and running in minutes
Streams video without a glitch, as well as older apps

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy this
customer_reviews.text: You guys must be getting pretty desperate, For what that thing cost it should be better than what it is especially for the cost. Even though I have Prime my Tablet came late. Its too big, you cant cover the screen, I got no carrying case. who wants to be carrying around something that looks like a desk top computer. This was a bad investment, I will make due with it but you sold me Beach Front property in New Mexico
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Williams

customer_reviews.title: New?
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be new but original AT&T box arrived with the seal tape broken, looks like a sticker or label on the box has been removed too, is there a reason behind this? Refurbished maybe? With this price i am thinking of returning it .
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet! I use it for everything I would normally use a Windows PC for - it can do it all! Word processing, spreadsheets, e-mail, you name it! Each day more and more apps are being developed for the Android operating system. This particular tablet has Android 8.1.0 installed and came with 64GB of internal memory and I added a 128GB external SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Smokehouse Dave

customer_reviews.title: No updates without AT&T.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to watch videos. Tha screen is pretty good. Touch screen is responsive. Battery life could be better. Few hours of videos and it goes from 100% to under 50. Lots of reviews mentioned an open box. Mine was also an open box. I realized the seller opened it to remove the preinstalled AT&T sim card. The Sim is mentioned in the enclosed quick start guide. That's why it was sold as unlocked I guess. Bad thing...no updates without AT&T. Not from Samsung from I've reasearched.
customer_reviews.author: Aschie

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was up in the air about getting the new view 2 or the original. The battery life is what made my decision. 12,000 mAh battery in the view 2 vs the 5700 mAh battery in the OG view. Android 8.1 vs android 5.1. I will be using this to stream at&t's "watchTV app" over at&t's LTE network when the power is out so the battery made a big impact on my decision. The only negative so far is this was sold to me WITHOUT a SIM card. I had to drive to an at&t store to get a SIM card. Not happy about that. Especially because these are supposed to come with a preinstalled SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use strictly as a wifi tablet. Worked great, easy to get up and running. Weighs exactly 5 lbs. so it's a bit cumbersome. To use on my lap, I turn it upside down and put a wedge between the back of the unit and the stand. My only problem with it is the quality of screen shots; they are pixelated. I'm used to the great screen shots I get on my Galaxy Tab 2.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: double check carrier unlock before you buy
customer_reviews.text: received the item. Tab is good but doesn't connect to other carriers. I bought it because it said at&t unlocked. if i try to connect manually its displays unable to register.
customer_reviews.author: M. Z. Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Product was not sealed
customer_reviews.text: Products soon up with broken seals come and not taped. I would just go with a different tablet such as the surface pro X. I received this product through (WirelessTechUSA)
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a back up streaming monitor. For this...its awesome. Here is a true typical scenario. I have a beautiful 75 inch HDR tv, in my living room. Yankees are on in 10 minutes...enough time for me to eat...and plant myself in front of my tv. As I hurriedly shuffle to my living room...I notice my wife beat me to the punch...and is already watching some horrible conspiracy theory show. I smile, sit down and pull 17 inch bad boy out, and begin to watch my Yankees in HD...on a huge screen. I’m a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: QBond

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tablet, I bought it used, and it came looking like new. Battery wise it is good, not the best but keep in mind it will last you 5 to 7 hrs on full brightness and full volume. Only draw back it the 1080p cap, wish it was at least 1440p but I am beyond happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Davila

customer_reviews.title: Get your new modle here
customer_reviews.text: this is a step up and step down from previous model. But it does what you want and buy it for. Resolution crystal clear, easy to set up, lighter than previous model, offers new screen tilt feature Cons A lot of games do not have support for sideways orientation, most games (not all) must be played with the tablet vertical. This isnt deal breaker just an annoyance
customer_reviews.author: kaimick

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen solution
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a kitchen/dining area tv with cable co. app. Great picture battery life and best of all no cords or cables. Bonus: cam load smartphone apps so you get notifications for laundry, oven etc. Also cookbook apps.
customer_reviews.author: donclothier

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is very bulky because it does not fold flat or close. It does have pretty good battery life and picture quality and it works decent for streaming movies or videos and some apps. It is extremely sluggish when it comes to playing games which is a disappointment. I've never had any other devices that are this slow, which is surprising for such a new device.
customer_reviews.author: jeff frohn

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Are use it to browse the Internet shop on Amazon and watch movies
customer_reviews.author: Surfctygirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product hefty price
customer_reviews.text: Love it as a portable TV and gigantic tablet. Wish they wouldn't have shrank it but it's not hugely noticable. All and all it is the same tablet but faster with a newer Android OS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really a tablet
customer_reviews.text: It's a tablet in that it doesn't have an attached keyboard and is just a touchscreen. It sits on an A frame and is too heavy to carry around. Seems more like a conference room presentation device.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Screen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for electronic signings - screen size matches up well with legal-size docs. Only complaint is hinge does not extend beyond tented position shown in the image, and does not fold flat. When using in portrait orientation it angles off to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great choice if you want a giant tablet!
customer_reviews.text: We have the View 1 and the View 2. The 2 is a little smaller but is a beautiful display, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: sparkler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Picture /video are crisp. And set up was easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything I use for shopping on Amazon wish do my projects. Iam happy.
customer_reviews.author: auder garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Wyland

customer_reviews.title: Works at Expected
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for seniors who want media at their finger tips. Purhased at a great price from Amazon. I can rely on the Samsung brand. Tablet sleeve does not fit actual device.
customer_reviews.author: TKC

customer_reviews.title: Missing my old tablet
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they still had my old one for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for 95 year old world war 2 vet
customer_reviews.text: For viewing everything especially movies, documents, old lotus files, Very good unit.
customer_reviews.author: oil finder

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service! This tablet was too big, so I sent it back immediately. It has been 3 weeks and the seller has yet to refund my money or even answer my emails!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: sleek new generation
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this tablet Loved the first gen and like this second gen even better
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Cool but very large
customer_reviews.text: Funny you should ask about thickness like that is a good thing. I got for self and I am a chair with dog on lap relaxer. Cool tablet but not a good physical fit for me. I was upset with my self for spending so much. My husband on the other hand likes to sit on char by table to relax. Well, happy merry birthmacass to him. He loves.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a great to have and will come in use for what we got it for. The only thing is, it would be nice if it had a front view camera.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! The large screen is great. It feels like I'm on my laptop. Easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tablet For Pandemic Virtual Fitness Classes!
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic and everything going virtual Samsung really missed a marketing opportunity for these massive tablets! It’s really too bad that they stopping making them. They are the perfect sized tablet to run fitness apps on! Since all the gyms are closed because of Covid we use it for our virtual spin, running, strength training and Barre classes. It really works great! It’s super big screen makes you feel totally immersed while in class or while taking a virtual bike ride or run. It is big yet It’s easily portable. We just carry around the house and it fits nicely on our different machines. Love it Samsung! Bring it back!
customer_reviews.author: MAY

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching Sports
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get my Samsung Galaxy View2 through Amazon. I got mine through AT&T and I absolutely LOVE IT! I got it for reading, to watch Sport, TV in the bathroom and when I travel. I can pay my bills and play my games. It could use a little more Ram, but for the most part, it's a good tablet
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A Caddell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t discount this a bad product
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and it is pretty big but not considering it’s a computer tablet. It was perfectly sealed, easy to set up, is HD and awesome. I won’t be carrying it around I have an iPhone for that unless I go on vacation. It came with a lightweight cloth cover but for the money I’ve spent I’m gonna get a carry case or something that fits it to protect it. I’m very careful with my electronic devices. I’m happy. Sorry if your not. Watching a movie or show is like being at the movies. I use it in bed
customer_reviews.author: CASSIDY BIBLE

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I love my View. It is a media machine. Mine sits on a bookshelf. I can play TV, cruise the Internet, do email or see the album covers of the music coming from the SD card. It's a media monster! I am sorry Samsung no longer makes larger pads and screens. I get pretty tired of 9.7 + 10.1.
customer_reviews.author: ShopHawk
